description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**General English II**

**Spring 2021**

**Friday 3-4 @** **正****204**

**Instructor:** **Yu-chun Huang** **黃郁珺****,** [**maverick.glider.ntnu@gmail.com**](mailto:maverick.glider.ntnu@gmail.com)

**Objectives**: This general English course is designed to enhance students’ reading, writing, listening and speaking skills. Students will be offered the opportunity to develop these 4 language skills along with critical thinking skills by presenting them with ideas from all over the world.

**Required Textbook:** _Keynote 4_

**Course Requirements**

**Attendance and Participation 20%**

Punctual attendance and active participation are essential. If you are habitually late, points will be deducted. If you miss the class more than 4 times for no reasons, you will likely fail this course. If you have to miss a class, please inform me and your group partners in advance: **email me** in advance, inform your group partners in advance, and mark it on the sign-in sheet.

**Participation, Quality Talk Discussion, and Seesaw Class Work & Homework 25%**

You are expected to work in pairs and in groups. Be a responsible partner. Finish what you need to finish before coming to the class. Log in to the Seesaw classroom and do the class work and QT discussion in class. Also, do the homework and make sure you won’t miss the deadline. Your participation grade counts as 25% of your final grade and will also be calculated based on your participation in the Seesaw activities.

**Midterm: 3-Minute Presentation ABC 20%**

依據師大 3分鐘英語簡報競賽規則

           一、多元文化議題 二、校園生活議題 三、個人專業學習領域 四、好書分享 五、其他與學術相關議題

A. Oral Presentation: 3 minutes in class, **memorized**, 1 slide (no sound)

B. Written: presentation script + self-evaluation (typed, double-spaced hard copies)

C. Upload 2 files to the Moodle: your presentation video file and presentation script file

**Class Activity Cultural Exchange 5%**

        Show and tell something Taiwanese in 30 seconds.

**Group Book Sale 10%**

Try to sell a book from the Lexile Library as a group to the audience in 7-10 minutes. The sales pitch should be informative, persuasive, and preferably interactive. The presentation will be graded by the amount of support (sales) you earn. Each person should have a speaking role.

**Final Oral Test 10%**

**\*Lexile Test 10% \*****請參閱各系英語畢業門檻** **Lexile****分數規定**

**\*****個人目標**: **比上學期考的前測進步** **50** **分**

**Bonus 5%****á**

Participation in English activities on or off campus, including 3-minute Presentation Contest.
